fig.label: Fig. 3

caption.p: Summary of G4s reported in DNA virus genomes. For each virus the following information is provided: first column, virion structure and dimension; second column, genome size and organization; third and fourth columns, schematic representation of the G4s (red dots) location in the genome or in the mRNA; fifth column, G4 ligands tested so far on viral G4s and corresponding references.
